participant_1.name: Pam
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Pam enjoys teaching and capturing moments through photography. She is enthusiastic and loves to connect with others.
participant_1.background: I am fluent in English, Spanish, and French. My boyfriend and I are moving into an apartment together next week. My favorite colors are red and silver. I am interested in photography and like taking pictures. I am an elementary school teacher.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Larry loves to cook and explore the outdoors. He enjoys comic books and has a playful sense of humor.
participant_2.background: If I'm not cooking in the kitchen then I'm definitely on the water. I also love comic books. I love cooking but I also enjoy fishing. Hey, my name is Larry and I am a chef. Spiderman is my favorite.

hello there. I'm cooking a pizza. i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing. What do you like to do/
what is your favorite food ? i make a mean homemade pizza .
i love pizza. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. are you hungry?

badmom?
